text: Kepha uma kufumaniseka ukuthi bona bobabili banesono ngakho-ke abanye ababili babo bayoma endaweni yabo (bayobamela) abayizihlobo eziseduze phakathi kwalabo abafuna ilungelo elisemthethweni, ngakho-ke bobabili abafunge ngoMvelinqangi ngempela ubufakazi bethu buyiqiniso ukwedlula ubufakazi babo bobabili futhi asizange sephule umthetho ngempela besizoba kanye nabayizoni
